source.en: Blaser, Magdalena "Myths of the Cofán people"

sentences.text: Fae tsandie tise dushundeccui'ccu tsampini jayipa choroma atte.
Attepa tisu añe atesu'chosi tai'je.
Tsa'caen taipa angapa otaen'jen añe.
Tsa tsandieja pushepa'pa toya'caen dushupa, tsa'ma tise dushundeccuja choroma añe atesu'fambi tise yaya'caen.
Tsa tsu fae a'ta tise dushundeccui'ccu tsampini ja.
Tsa'caen tsampi japa cosejisi tsao'ña'fa tsao'ñamba nanimba ccaquejema puiña'fa.
Tsomba ana'fa.
Ccaqui a'ta tsampini japa cachaipa tivepa'cco con'sime fi'tti'fa.
Tsa'ccaen fi'ttipa tsaosini jipa matssamba sa'sa'fa.
Sa'sa nanimba naiquini angapa cashipa tssaña'fa.
Tsomba tonsan'cconga san'jan'fa.
San'jamba amba anamba ccaqui a'ta tsa tsandie'ja tsaqquie'su.
Tsa'qquie'supa naiquini cui'su japa tsaoni jimbi.
Tsa'caen jimbi'si naiquini ttatta'su japa tise yayama atte'fa nai'quini cu'i ccui'choma.
Ja attepa can'boen ccutsunga'fa tise yaya tsa'ccuma cu'ipa nai'quima sambaenjinsi.
Tsa'caen tise'pa caña'jen'ni cui'je tsa nai'quima samboen.
Samboemba tise ai'voja randeve suforo.
Tsa'caen dapa jangi dyaipa tise dushundeccuma attepa su: Ña in'jan'cho dushusha'va, junde favatsse va'ttie ja'faja que'i ccushaye in'jan'da.
Ñanda gi va'ttima dañoñe tso'jen.
Toya'caen tsangae gi singu'ccuni canseye tson'jen, que'ishaja tsaoni japa que'i mamama ñotsse coirapa tise'ccu canse'faja.
Qquen susi dyopa tsaosiningae buttoin ja'fa.
Tsa'caen buttopa japa tise'pa aña'cho san'jama ppiña ppiñamba tsa'oye sombopa canqqueningae jaye ja'fa.
Tsa'caen japa ccotta'cconga ansundepa tseni ñofa'jenga'fa.
Tise'pa ñofa'je'ni naiquine po'ta.
Po'tapa tssanda'can'en jen, tsa tsandie cu'i'cho tsa'ccuja singu'ccuve da.
Toya'caen tsa tsandie'ja choro canjansive di'shapa tsangae tsa singu'ccuni canseye ja.
